fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Authorize an investigation on 1 player during the day. You may authorize an additional target for every 10 players in the game, living or dead, rounded. Mandatory or random.
- Extend the day meeting during the day. 1 Use.
- Select an heir for your role at any time.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your Authorized targets will be revealed each night.
- You may not authorize yourself as a target.
- Extending the day meeting will replace the following night with yet another Day Phase, though it will still be called a night phase. Similarly, it will be proceeded by yet another day phase, however after this day phase ends it will finally be night.
- You have one secret vote to use at your disposal, counting as enough votes to instantly lynch a person. You may not vote nightfall with it.
- When you die, your heir will be promoted to a Chairman (2430) if they are a Sentry. Otherwise, it will be a random Sentry. They may not extend the day meeting.
- You may use your abilities in conjunction with each other.
- Conversion Immunity.
